Dm_OP_0017_Text_000_b:
People have been falling ill after coming into contact
with the gloom drifting through these caverns.
Dm_OP_0017_Text_001_b:
Though here it seems almost misty and not
concentrated enough to harm us...
Dm_OP_0017_Text_002_b:
We'll keep going. With it coming up from beneath
Hyrule Castle...
Dm_OP_0017_Text_003_b:
We do not know what waits below, so we need to
be ready for anything. But I know I'll be OK with
you, Link.
